PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Iconic sunglasses combining timeless style with optical precision. From classic Aviators to bold Wayfarers, each frame features premium materials, UV protection, and distinctive design that has defined cool for generations.
UNIQUE_SELLING_POINT: Premium sunglasses that don't just protect your eyes but define your style and attitude
TARGET_AUDIENCE: Style-conscious individuals aged 25-45 who value authentic design, quality craftsmanship, and making a statement with their eyewear
BRAND_VALUES: Bold self-expression, authentic confidence, innovation in style, and seeing life from a fresh perspective
VALUE_PROPOSITION: Premium eyewear that enhances your view and elevates your style, giving you the confidence to see and be seen differently
BRAND_PERSONALITY: Bold, innovative, confident, stylish with an edge
CREATIVE_DIRECTION: Office worker discovers SunVue sunglasses transform boring reality into extraordinary experiences. Each frame style unlocks a different vibe: Aviators turn the grey office into a cool party with champagne water coolers and DJ boss; Wayfarers transform it into a rooftop celebration with confetti photocopiers; Cat-Eyes make reality playfully surreal with dancing plants and paper airplane emails. When glasses come off, dull reality returns instantly - proving SunVue frames don't just change how you look, they change how you see life. Tagline: Never Hide.
